AVSEC ORDER 2 / 2001 
 
 
Sub : Provision for installation of Hooters at Airports in India. 
 
 
 In exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of Aircraft Act 1934 
delegated to him vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification 
No.1797 dated 3, Jul 1997 Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation), Bureau of 
Civil Aviation Security for the purpose of Securing the safety of aircraft operation 
and in order to forewarn all security personnel deployed at different points in the 
airports in India in case of any attack at a particular point (s) or airport / airport / 
vital installations, directs  that the hooter system shall be installed and 
maintained regularly at all access points in civil airport in the country by the 
concerned airport operator. 
 
(VEERANNA  AIVALLI) 
COMMISSIONER OF SECURITY (CIVIL AVIATION) 
 
(REF:NO.CAS-7 (15)2001 (Misc).Div.I.      Dated 19.03.2001)
